{"id":1590152790,"question_id":3805,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1743260742,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"102 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1590152790/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Active Section with Trade I","memory":"79.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxActiveSectionsAfterTrade(string s) {\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        int curr = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)\n            curr += s[i] - '0';\n        int prev = curr;\n\n        s = \"1\" + s + \"1\";\n        N = (int)s.size();\n        int activ = 0;\n        \n        int l = 0, r = 0;\n        while (s[l] == '1')\n            l++;\n        r = l;\n        for (; r<N; r++) {\n            while (!activ || s[r] == '1') {\n                activ += (s[r] == '1');\n                r++;\n            }\n            if (r >= N)\n                break;\n            curr = max(curr, prev + r-l+1 - activ);\n            while (activ && s[r+1] == '1') {\n                activ -= (s[l] == '1');\n                l++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return curr;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-active-section-with-trade-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1093}
